item.title: Comment on Why you should use nth-child instead of class=”odd|even” by Phpthug

item.description: Been tying to get people on that for almost two years ago now. One day...

item.title: Comment on drupal XSS filtering removes unrecognized tags by Justin Ramb
item.dc:creator: Justin Ramb
item.description: Hey David, I have been trying to track you down. We have some freelance work for our agency and wasnt sure if you were interested. Please contact us if you have some time. Thanks. Justin Ramb
item.content:encoded:
Hey David,
I have been trying to track you down. We have some freelance work for our agency and wasnt sure if you were interested. Please contact us if you have some time.
Thanks.
Justin Ramb
